name: Tab Manipulator
description: Sort tabs, merge windows, extract domain and other tab manipulation.
author: Lau Kondrup

mergeWindows.description: Merge all tabs from all windows

extractDomain.description: Combine all tabs matching the current domain into one new window

sortByNumDomain.description: Sort tabs by the number of tabs for each domain

closeTabsLeft.description: Close all tabs to the left

closeTabsRight.description: Close all tabs to the right

closeAllExceptCurrentTab.description: Close all except the current tab
